basicInfo.name: Howl
basicInfo.flavor: Howl's continued use of forbidden magic has rendered him insane. With his insanity, he gained incredible magic power.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Shock
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Empower Allies
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Damage Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Forbidden Magic
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 60% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]

profile.story:
Howl is a highly intelligent boar beastkin living in the Dragon Ruins.
Most boar beastkin end up as food due to their clumsy and slow nature, but the boar beastkin of Dragon Ruins live mostly peaceful lives thanks to Jave.
However, Jave tends to not involve himself unless a conflict is particularly large, so the boar beastkin are still vulnerable to being preyed on while alone.
Howl was tired of living in constant fear, so after many long years of research he obtained the power of forbidden magic.
However, unbeknownst to him, his mental state is rapidly deteriorating as a side effect of using this power.

Passive.desc:

 - Revives with 45% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
